creator: john.butterfield@diamondcluster.com
text:
Version 1.7 - Jmeter
Java 1.3.1_07
Windows 2k

When attempting to use the FTP request module the first packet is split into 3 
separate packets.
"USER joesmith" becomes "U"  "SER joesmi" "th"
I have checked the FTP code and there are no problems with that.  Could there 
be a problem with the combination of software?

-John
I get similiar behaviour:Version 1.7.1 (latest build)Java 1.4.0Linux 2.4.10But two packets instead of three.I'll post a patch to fix this.
